catalyst: The catalyst used in the experiment is NaTaO3 doped with lanthanum (La) and co-catalysts such as NiO and CuO.
co_catalyst: The co-catalyst used in the experiment is NiO.
light source: Hg lamp with 77 W power (WACOM HX-500 lamp house, Japan)
reaction medium: The reaction medium used in the experiment is an aqueous alkaline solution (0.2 mol L^-1 NaOH).
